thread.title: Full statement from Hamas’s Osama Hamdan on on-going truce talks
thread.title_full: Full statement from Hamas’s Osama Hamdan on on-going truce talks

author: Ava
title: Full statement from Hamas’s Osama Hamdan on on-going truce talks
text:
Hamas says it's studying the latest Israeli proposal for a ceasefire in a 'positive manner'. The group's delegation has travelled to Cairo to discuss the deal with mediators.
Osama Hamdan, a Senior Spokesperson for Hamas, joins Al Jazeera’s live on the line from Beirut.
